Description:
--------------
Inhabitants Oddworlds will return for a spectacular package for PC which includes four titles in the series (Abe's Oddysee, Abe's Exoddus, Munch's Oddysee and Stranger's Wraht), under the name The Oddbox.
With a first trilogy mainly oriented to the exploration and platforms, Oddworld then tip over into action, but keeping the aesthetics of a dark and oppressive world of slavery and mysteries.
